name: jobheidi.com
overview:
JOBHEIDI.COM contains all jobs of the all big job portals in Switzerland.

Features:

  • Jobs from all the big platforms in Switzerland are being aggregated and updated every hour.

  • Formatting of aggregated jobs is being removed to improve the overview and search speed.

  • Search for keywords, job titles or skills in all jobs, including the job content. In the search results, the corresponding text passage is highlighted. Add many search words step by step and hence narrow a specific job. One can delete search words separately, without losing already added search words.

  • Exclude jobs from recruiters.

  • Add jobs to favorites, comment or print as PDF.

  • Combine search criteria (industry, place/canton, search words etc.) and create search subscriptions. Results will be emailed periodically.

  • Add jobs for free.
